Virginia Tech Interested Students

Currently a Virginia Tech student and interested in getting involved with BRICC@MICS?

Our group hosts weekly interest group meetings to learn about research conducted by the current students, in addition to discussing other research domains in the Brain-Inspired Computing field. Undergraduate students also have the opportunity to get involved with projects that may count for their course credits. Please reach out to Dr. Yang (Cindy) Yi for more information on how to join!
